Chaxiraxi bụ chi nwanyị, nke a maara dịka Nne Anyanwụ, n'okpukpe nke ndị Guanche bi na Canary Islands
Chaxiraxi bụ otu n'ime chi nwanyị ndị isi nke pantheon Guanche
E jikọtara ya na kpakpando Canopus.
Dịka e kwenyere na ụmụ amaala nke Canary Islands bụ ndị Berber tupu mmepeanya, a na-eche na Chaxiraxi nwere ike ịbụ nke sitere na chi nwanyị Punic-Berber Tanit, e nyere aha dị iche na njirimara
Ụfọdụ na-ejikọkwa ya na ọdịdị a n'ihe dị ka 1392, 1400 maọbụ 1401 nke Virgin nke Candelaria na Güímar, n'àgwàetiti Tenerife, bu nwa ya, Chijoraji.
A na-ewere Chaxiraxi dị ka chi nwanyị bụ isi nke okpukpe ọhụrụ na Chọọchị nke ndị Guanche.
